21040036.name: Blazing Justice
21040036.descBody: Increases ATK by {0}. Casting Basic Attack grants the following effects: Dealing damage ignores {1} of the target's DEF and Amplifies Spectro Frazzle DMG dealt by {2} for 6s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.

21030026.name: Woodland Aria
21030026.descBody: ATK is increased by {0}. Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives {1} Aero DMG Bonus for 10s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by {2} for 20s.

21050056.name: Whispers of Sirens
21050056.descBody:
Increases ATK by {0}. Casting Echo Skill within 10s after casting Intro Skill or Basic Attacks grants 1 stack of Gentle Dream. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once, stacking up to 2 times, lasting for 10s. When reaching 2 stacks, casting Echo Skill no longer resets the duration of this effect. This effect activates up to once per 10s. Switching to another Resonator ends this effect early.
With 1 Stack: Grants {1} Basic Attack DMG Bonus.
With 2 Stacks: Ignores {2} of the target's Havoc RES.

21020046.name: Bloodpact's Pledge
21020046.descBody: Providing Healing increases Resonance Skill DMG by {0} for 6s. When Rover: Aero casts Resonance Skill Unbound Flow, Aero DMG dealt by nearby Resonators on the field is Amplified by {1} for 30s.

21050046.name: Luminous Hymn
21050046.descBody: Increase ATK by {0}. Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder {1} Basic Attack DMG Bonus and {2} Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 times for 6s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by {3} for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

21050027.name: Ocean's Gift
21050027.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Spectro Frazzle increases the wielder's Spectro DMG by {0}, gaining 1 stack per second for 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

21020036.name: Unflickering Valor
21020036.descBody: Increase CRIT Rate by {0}. Casting Resonance Liberation gives {1} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 10s. Dealing Basic Attack DMG gives {2} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 4s.

21050094.name: Waltz in Masquerade
21050094.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4 times.

21050017.name: Call of the Abyss
21050017.descBody: Casting Resonance Liberation increases the Resonator's Healing Bonus by {0} for 15s.

21040094.name: Legend of Drunken Hero
21040094.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4 times.

21040026.name: Tragicomedy
21040026.descBody: Increases ATK by {0}. Every time Basic Attack or Intro Skill is cast, Heavy Attack DMG Bonus increases by {1} for 3s.

21030094.name: Romance in Farewell
21030094.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4 times.

21030016.name: The Last Dance
21030016.descBody: Increases ATK by {0}. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by {1} for 5s.

21020094.name: Fables of Wisdom
21020094.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4 times.

21010094.name: Meditations on Mercy
21010094.descBody: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4 times.

21020026.name: Red Spring
21020026.descBody:
Increase ATK by {0}. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains {1} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 14s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to 3 times.
When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain {2} Basic DMG Bonus for 10s. This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

21020017.name: Somnoire Anchor
21020017.descBody:
Gain 1 stack of Hiss when dealing damage to the target, with 1 stack generated every 1s.
Hiss: each stack increases the wielder's ATK by {0} for 3s, stacking up to 10 times. Switching off the wielder clears all stacks. Gaining 10 stacks increases the wielder's CRIT Rate by {1}.

21050084.name: Fusion Accretion
21050084.descBody: Casting the Resonance Skill grants {0} Resonance Energy and increases ATK by {1}, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

21050036.name: Stellar Symphony
21050036.descBody: Increase HP by {0}. Restore {1} Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by {2} for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

21040084.name: Celestial Spiral
21040084.descBody: Casting the Resonance Skill grants {0} Resonance Energy and increases ATK by {1}, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

21030084.name: Relativistic Jet
21030084.descBody: Casting the Resonance Skill grants {0} Resonance Energy and increases ATK by {1}, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

21020084.name: Endless Collapse
21020084.descBody: Casting the Resonance Skill grants {0} Resonance Energy and increases ATK by {1}, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

21010084.name: Waning Redshift

21050026.name: Rime-Draped Sprouts
21050026.descBody: Increase ATK by {0}. While the wielder is on the field, using Resonance Skill grants {1} Basic Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 times for 6s. At 3 stacks or above, casting Outro Skill consumes all stacks of this effect and grants the wielder {2} Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 27s, effective when the wielder is off the field.

21040016.name: Verity's Handle
21040016.descBody: Gain {0} Attribute DMG Bonus. When using Resonance Liberation, the wielder gains {1} Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 8s. This effect can be extended by 5s each time Resonance Skills are cast, up to 3 times.

21020016.name: Blazing Brilliance
21020016.descBody: ATK increased by {0}. The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives {1} additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in 12s.

21010063.name: Beguiling Melody
21010063.descBody: When Intro Skill is cast, restores {0} Concerto Energy. When Outro Skill is cast, restores {1} Resonance Energy.

21010026.name: Ages of Harvest

21050015.name: Cosmic Ripples
21050015.descBody: Increases Energy Regen by {0}. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by {1}, stacking up to 5 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.5s.

21050013.descBody: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by {0}, lasting for 10s.

21040044.name: Amity Accord

21040043.name: Gauntlets of Voyager
21040043.descBody: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores {0} Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

21040034.name: Gauntlets#21D

21040024.name: Marcato
21040024.descBody: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores {0} Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 times every 20s.

21040023.name: Originite: Type IV
21040023.descBody: When dealing Basic Attack DMG, heals {0} of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.

21040015.name: Abyss Surges
21040015.descBody: Increases Energy Regen by {0}. When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by {1}, lasting for 8s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by {2}, lasting for 8s.

21040013.name: Gauntlets of Night
21040013.descBody: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by {0}, lasting for 10s.

21030074.name: Thunderbolt

21020064.name: Lunar Cutter
21020064.descBody: Equipped Resonator gains 6 stack(s) of Oath upon entering the battlefield. Each stack increases ATK by {0}, up to 6 stacks. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s. The equipped Resonator loses 1 stack(s) of Oath every 2s, and gains 6 stack(s) upon defeating an enemy.

21020053.name: Guardian Sword

21020024.descBody: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores {0} Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

21010074.name: Autumntrace

21010064.name: Helios Cleaver
21010064.descBody: Within 12s after Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by {0} every 2s, stacking up to 4 time(s). This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s. When the number of stacks reaches 4, all stacks will be reset within 6s.

21010053.name: Guardian Broadblade
21010053.descBody: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by {0}.

21010024.descBody: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores {0} Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
